title: semblance.us
description: The purpose of this project is to encourage people to meet others locally, in-person through the gamification of story archetypes and narrative choices.

title: Smiling School
description: This is a project for school in which students were tasked with replicating a website designed in Figma and then were later asked to add simple functionality.

title: Frontend School Projects
description: This repository contains various frontend projects completed for school.

title: Backend School Projects
description: This repository contains various backend projects completed for school.

title: Gates of Shell
description: This is a project for school in which students were tasked with coding a simple unix shell in the C programming language. All functions were made from scratch with a box of scraps.

title: Stock Trading Bot
description: Fun challenge. If you're a developer, I feel like you need to have tried this once.

title: Simple Lead Generator
description: The purpose of this script is to provide a GUI for scraping emails, phone numbers, and contact urls from the top result of duckduckgo from a list of business names in an excel sheet.

title: This Website!
description: The main purpose of this website is to market myself to potential employers.
